Augusta Henriques bụ onye na-eme ihe, onye nkuzi na minista gọọmentị si Guinea-Bissau, onye natara onyinye Ramsar Wetland Conservation Award (Management) na 2012.

N'afọ 1991, Henriques so guzobe otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị bụ Tiniguena, nke na-eme mkpọsa maka ọrụala dị iche iche na itinye aka n'obodo na Guinea-Bissau. Ọ bụkwa onye mbụ  guzobere Foundation for Education with Production, ọrụ ebere nke Patrick van Rensberg mepụtara.

Henriques nọchitere anya mba ahụ na mba ụwa, gụnyere dịka onye nnọchi anya nye International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN). Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Ministry of National Education dị ka Onye isi nke Adult Education.
